a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Use of interpolation and extrapolation on original Gini coefficient
In order to produce global estimates of historical poverty trends we have interpolated or extrapolated inequality data for

missing observations. Green indicates observations of the
Gini coefficient
available in the original source.
Data source: OWID based on Maddison Project Database 2020, GCIP, van Zanden et al. (2014), de la Escosura (2012)
